com.nokia.maps.component.feedback

Class FocalObserverComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.nokia.maps.component.feedback.FocalObserverComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent

    public class FocalObserverComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
    This class defines a MapComponent which allows another class to listen for an event which is fired whenever a registered MapObject is moved to the centre of the screen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ID
      This constant defines a unique ID for the Focal Observer Component.

      • Fields inherited from class com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent

        map

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addData(MapObject mapObject, java.lang.Object data)
      This method associates a data object to a map object.
      void addData(java.lang.Object data)
      This method associates a data object to the MapObject currently found at the centre of the screen.
      void clear()
      This method clears all data associated with the FocalObserverComponent.
      java.lang.Object getData(MapObject mapObject)
      This method retrieves the data object currently associated with a given the MapObject.
      MapObject[] getMapObjects()
      This method retrieves all the MapObjects which have attached focal observer data.
      void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
      This method is called when the map is updated, a check is made to see if one of the associated MapObjects has been moved to/away from the centre of the screen and fire an FocalEventListener event if necessary.
      void removeData(MapObject mapObject)
      This method removes the association between a data object and a MapObject.

      • FocalObserverComponent

        public FocalObserverComponent(FocalEventListener listener)

    • Method Detail

      • addData

        public void addData(MapObject mapObject,
           java.lang.Object data)
        This method associates a data object to a map object. The data is passed in an event when the MapObject is centred on screen.
        Parameters:
        mapObject - A MapObject that causes an event to fire when it is centered on screen.
        data - the associated data.

      • addData

        public void addData(java.lang.Object data)
        This method associates a data object to the MapObject currently found at the centre of the screen. The data is passed in an event when the MapObject is centered on screen.
        Parameters:
        data - the associated data.

      • getData

        public java.lang.Object getData(MapObject mapObject)
        This method retrieves the data object currently associated with a given the MapObject. is centered on screen.
        Parameters:
        mapObject - the associated data.
        Returns:
        The data currently associated with the requested MapObject or null, if no data is associated to the MapObject

      • getMapObjects

        public MapObject[] getMapObjects()
        This method retrieves all the MapObjects which have attached focal observer data.
        Returns:
        The set of MapObjects which have associated data.

      • removeData

        public void removeData(MapObject mapObject)
        This method removes the association between a data object and a MapObject.
        Parameters:
        mapObject - A MapObject that already has associated data.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        This method clears all data associated with the FocalObserverComponent.

      • mapUpdated

        public void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
        This method is called when the map is updated, a check is made to see if one of the associated MapObjects has been moved to/away from the centre of the screen and fire an FocalEventListener event if necessary.
        Specified by:
        mapUpdated in interface MapComponent
        Overrides:
        mapUpdated in class AbstractMapComponent
        Parameters:
        zoomChanged - Whether the zoom level of the MapDisplay has been changed.
